content.en: Video Enhancement: Researchers are exploring how convolutional neural networks, temporal-CNN architecture, deep features obtained from pretrained convolutional neural networks, low complexity CNNs, enhanced deep convolutional neural networks, deep neural networks, ViSTRA2, neural video coding, a deep learning accelerator, compound spatiotemporal representation, the BVI-DVC database, FastRWDnet, an additive 3D-CNN model, compressed video analysis, and deep learning techniques can improve various aspects of video quality and compression. These algorithms are being investigated for their potential to enhance spatial resolution, reduce artifacts, improve video coding efficiency, denoise videos, predict inter-frame residuals, and enhance the quality of decoded frames, among other applications. The goal is to leverage the power of artificial intelligence to enhance the viewing experience and optimize video compression standards.
content.da: Video Forbedring: Forskere undersøger, hvordan konvolutionelle neurale netværk, temporal-CNN arkitektur, dybe funktioner opnået fra fortrænede konvolutionelle neurale netværk, lavkompleksitets-CNN'er, forbedrede dybe konvolutionelle neurale netværk, dybe neurale netværk, ViSTRA2, neurale video kodning, en dyb læringsaccelerator, sammensat spatiotemporal repræsentation, BVI-DVC databasen, FastRWDnet, en additiv 3D-CNN model, komprimeret videoanalyse og dybe læringsteknikker kan forbedre forskellige aspekter af videokvalitet og kompression. Disse algoritmer bliver undersøgt for deres potentiale til at forbedre rumlig opløsning, reducere artefakter, forbedre videokodningseffektivitet, støjreduktion i videoer, forudsige interframe residualer og forbedre kvaliteten af dekodede frames, blandt andre anvendelser. Målet er at udnytte kraften af kunstig intelligens til at forbedre seeroplevelsen og optimere standarderne for videokompression.
